import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css"; // requires a loader import { Carousel } from 'react-responsive-carousel'; import Logo from '../Assets/tweed-logo-white.svg' import HBmenu from '../Assets/Hamburger_icon_white.svg.png' import GreenKushBud from '../Assets/afghan-kush-bud.png' import GreenKushBoxes from '../Assets/afghan-kush-boxes.png' import Fpamobile from '../Assets/FPA-mobile.svg' import BlueBg from '../Assets/blueBg.jpeg' import GreenBg from '../Assets/greenBg.jpeg' import OneKush from "./../Assets/Green.gif"; import BlueProd from '../Assets/afghan-kush-container.svg' import GreenProd from '../Assets/Sativa.png' /** * @author * @function Info **/ const Info = (props) => { var section = document.getElementById('accordionEffect') const [info, setInfo] = useState({ title: '1 Quickie.', subtitle: '0.35g per Quickie', sideInfor: '', subside: '', strain: '' }) // function toggleAccordion() { // section.removeClass("active"); // this.addClass("active"); // // section2.removeClass("active"); // // $(this).addClass("active"); // } useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setInfo({ title: '10 Quickie.', subtitle: '0.35g per Quickie', sideInfor: 'AFGHAN KUSH', subside: '21% THC', strain: 'Sativa' }) }, 3000) }, []) return (
{/* One Quickie */}

{info.sideInfor}

{info.subside}

{info.strain}

{info.title}

{info.subtitle}

{/* Lineage */}

LINEAGE

AFGHAN KUSH

Tweed Afghan Kush is an indica-dominant strain with high THC and minimal amounts of CBD. Afghan Kush originates from the Hindu Kush mountain range located along the Pakistan and Afghanistan border. The buds tend to be dense and covered with trichomes.

{/* Flavour Profile */}

FLAVOUR
PROFILE

AFGHAN KUSH

{/* Info Capture */}

AFGHAN KUSH

21% THC

Hi, how would you rate your experience of www.tweedquickies.com?

This communication is intended for adults only and should not be shared with minors. There are risks associated with cannabis use. For information, search online “Health Canada - cannabis health effects”.
